name: Mandarin Immersion Program
description: Offers early education programs that will immerse your child in the Mandarin culture. Designed to develop each child’s cognitive, physical, social, and emotional skills, the language immersion program is available to students throughout the San Francisco, CA area who enroll at our preschool center at Stonecrest.
